Class Enquiry

Object
Enquiry
public class Enquiry extends Object
Represents an enquiry about a BTO project. Users can submit enquiries to get more information about projects.
Since:
2025-03-16
Version:
1.0
Author:
SC2002 G Team

  • Constructor Details

    • Enquiry

      public Enquiry(String enquiryId, User user, Project project, String enquiryText)
      Creates a new Enquiry with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - The unique identifier for this enquiry
      user - The user who submitted this enquiry
      project - The project this enquiry is about
      enquiryText - The text content of the enquiry

  • Method Details

    • editText

      public boolean editText(String newText)
      Updates the text content of this enquiry.
      Parameters:
      newText - The new text content
      Returns:
      true if the text was updated successfully

    • addReply

      public boolean addReply(String replyText, User replier)
      Adds a reply to this enquiry.
      Parameters:
      replyText - The text content of the reply
      replier - The user who is replying
      Returns:
      true if the reply was added successfully

    • getEnquiryId

      public String getEnquiryId()
      Gets the unique identifier of this enquiry.
      Returns:
      The enquiry ID

    • getUser

      public User getUser()
      Gets the user who submitted this enquiry.
      Returns:
      The user

    • getProject

      public Project getProject()
      Gets the project this enquiry is about.
      Returns:
      The project

    • getEnquiryText

      public String getEnquiryText()
      Gets the text content of this enquiry.
      Returns:
      The enquiry text

    • getDateSubmitted

      public Date getDateSubmitted()
      Gets the date when this enquiry was submitted.
      Returns:
      The submission date

    • getReply

      public String getReply()
      Gets the reply to this enquiry, if any.
      Returns:
      The reply text, or null if no reply exists

    • getReplyDate

      public Date getReplyDate()
      Gets the date when a reply was added to this enquiry, if any.
      Returns:
      The reply date, or null if no reply exists

    • getRepliedBy

      public User getRepliedBy()
      Gets the user who replied to this enquiry, if any.
      Returns:
      The user who replied, or null if no reply exists
